sources.title: The Only Thrill (1997) Sometimes your only chance for love comes once.
sources.description:
Reece McHenry and Carol Fitzsimmons keep missing their shot at love as life keeps tossing them curveballs. Years roll by, but these two just can’t seem to get their timing right—will they ever figure it out?

Director: Martha Coolidge
Writers: Joe Bologna, Renée Taylor

Main cast:
Greg Kinnear - Reece McHenry
Sam Shepard - Reece McHenry (older)
Diane Keaton - Carol Fitzsimmons
Robert Patrick - Tom McHenry
Blythe Danner - Katherine McHenry
Beau Bridges - Frank
Deborah May - Ann
Bridgette Wilson-Sampras - Elray

Genres: Drama, Romance
Release date: October 17, 1997 (USA)
Filming location: Austin, Texas, USA

metadata.Plot: Reece McHenry is a used-clothing store owner and Carol Fitzsimmons is a seamstress working in that store. The film follows the story of their relationships from 1960s till present time (as well as the story of relationships between Reece's son Tom and Carol's daughter Katherine).
metadata.Actors: Diane Keaton, Sam Shepard, Diane Lane
